document_data.mainbody:
Sergeant Thureshs 101 Essays on Military Tactics was a book of military knowledge penned by Sergeant Ugrand Thuresh of Waterdeep sometime before the late 14 century DR.
A copy of Sergeant Thureshs 101 Essays on Military Tactics belonged to Manshoon XII, a clone of Manshoon, in the . The book was stored in the mages library of mundane and arcane tomes in his lair in an abandoned temple of Amaunator underneath the City of the Dead of Waterdeep.
